bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Lawrence [Walter L.] Reed to Philip Showalter Hench, November 13, 1947

div1.p: Lawrence Reed informs Hench that he is willing to take Hench to see the room where his father, Walter Reed, died.

div1.head: Letter from Lawrence [Walter L.] Reed to Philip Showalter Hench, November 13, 1947
div1.opener:
C
R
2810-36 Place n w
Nov- 13- 47
My dear Colonel Hench-
div1.p:
I am delighted to
learn you are coming our
way again this month-
I will be delighted to take
you to the Army War College
where we can see the room which
Gen? Truby identified as the one
in which Father died-

Call me up and we can
arrange for the trip at your
convenience,
